action.content:
Please help me with the following task. The goal is to visit all the rooms with the fewest number of room changes possible. You are given a description of the room at each step and need to decide the direction to go in. Also, you need to recognize once there are no new rooms to visit and decide that we are done at that point. Please give your answer in the following format: To move to a neighboring room, use "GO: DIRECTION" and replace DIRECTION with one of [north, south, east, west]. To stop the exploration, answer with "DONE" instead. Omit any other text.
Here is an example:
You are in the initial room, which has the following description: a kitchen with light wooden cabinets, a grey floor and a silver oven and dishwasher. Currently available directions: south, west. What is your next instruction?
GO: west
You have made a step and entered a room, which has the following description: a bedroom with a large bed, couch, a ceiling fan, 3 windows equipped with shutter and a white floor carpet. Currently available directions: east, north. What is your next instruction?
GO: north
...
You have made a step and entered a room, which has the following description: a bathroom with blue tiles, a sink and a mirror with two towels hanging on the wall to the left. Currently available directions: south. What is your next instruction?
DONE
Let us start. You are in the initial room, which has the following description: a bow window in a living room with a view on some trees in the the street. Currently available directions: south, west. What is your next instruction?

You have made a step and entered a room, which has the following description: 4 chairs around a wooden table with a lamp hanging from the ceiling and a window in the back. Currently available directions: north, west. What is your next instruction?

You have made a step and entered a room, which has the following description: 4 chairs around a wooden table with a lamp hanging from the ceiling and a window in the back. Currently available directions: north, west. What is your next instruction?

You have made a step and entered a room, which has the following description: a room with a table for playing pool, a carpet and a ratan couch with red cushonsin the back. Currently available directions: north, east. What is your next instruction?

You have made a step and entered a room, which has the following description: a room with a table for playing pool, a carpet and a ratan couch with red cushonsin the back. Currently available directions: north, east. What is your next instruction?

You have made a step and entered a room, which has the following description: a children bedroom with a single bed, a white drawer with a large mirror, 2 paintings and a fake white rabbit. Currently available directions: south, east, west. What is your next instruction?

You have made a step and entered a room, which has the following description: a children bedroom with a single bed, a white drawer with a large mirror, 2 paintings and a fake white rabbit. Currently available directions: south, east, west. What is your next instruction?
You have made a step and entered a room, which has the following description: a bunk bed with a washbasin to its left. Currently available directions: south, east. What is your next instruction?
You have made a step and entered a room, which has the following description: a bunk bed with a washbasin to its left. Currently available directions: south, east. What is your next instruction?

You have made a step and entered a room, which has the following description: many small green houses and large trees in the back. Currently available directions: north. What is your next instruction?

You have made a step and entered a room, which has the following description: many small green houses and large trees in the back. Currently available directions: north. What is your next instruction?
The guesser decided to stop the game
